title: Large Language Models for Automated Synoptic Reports and Resectability Categorization in Pancreatic Cancer
details: R Bhayana, B Nanda, T Dehkharghanian, Y Deng… - Radiology, 2024
abstract: Background Structured radiology reports for pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma (PDAC) improve surgical decision-making over free-text reports, but radiologist adoption is variable. Resectability criteria are applied inconsistently. Purpose To …
